definition: load carried by a pack animal
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
pannier/double basket slung across pack animal
Skanda, the general or guardian Bodhisattva
pannier/double basket slung across pack animal
to transport on pack animal/to carry (a load on one's back)

sentences.english: The canine PBRSOLT is an ideal animal experiment model.
sentences.chinese: 犬是背驮式减体积肝移植理想的动物实验模型。

sentences.english: The sparrow is sorry for the peacock at the burdern of its tail.
sentences.chinese: 麻雀因孔雀驮着翎尾而替它担忧。

sentences.english: Every horse thinks his sack heaviest.
sentences.chinese: 每匹马都认为自己驮的袋子最重。

sentences.english: Two mules well-laden with packs were trudging along.
sentences.chinese: 两头骡子驮着包裹长途跋涉。

sentences.english: One day, a colt took a bag of wheat to the mill.
sentences.chinese: 一天，小马驮着麦子去磨坊。

sentences.english: Still others drift in the wind or ride on the backs of flies.
sentences.chinese: 甚至还有虫卵可以漂浮在空气中或者驮在苍蝇的背上。

sentences.english: This horse won the golden horseshoes to take me on his back.
sentences.chinese: 这匹马是因为把我驮在马背上才赢得金马掌的。
那头骆驼驮的是谷物吗？

sentences.english: Asiatic buffalo often domesticated for use as a draft animal.
sentences.chinese: 亚洲水牛，常蓄养作驮用。

sentences.english: Crossing the mountains, trading tea and salt with antlers and musks.
sentences.chinese: 跨过了千山万岭，驮走鹿茸麝香，换来盐巴茶叶。

sentences.english: Pa3. L15. and packed the oxen with our supplies.
sentences.chinese: 把生活用品都让牛驮着。

sentences.english: Full of children on his back, the black bear laughs convulsively .
sentences.chinese: 狗熊马驮满了小朋友，咯咯笑得浑身抖。

sentences.english: The burros were loaded down with the ranchers' food and bedding.
sentences.chinese: 让美洲驴驮着主人的食物和被褥。

sentences.english: So it is normal for a burro to have some dirt in its coat.
sentences.chinese: 因此，驮驴的毛发上有脏土污垢是很正常的。

sentences.english: An ass lade with gold overtake every thing.
He investigated actually various areas in the north one after the other with horses and mules carrying his books for reference.
sentences.chinese: 他先后到北方各地考察，用马和骡子驮着书籍备用。

definition: to transport on pack animal/to carry (a load on one's back)
outside horses of a team of 4
